metadata.title: CVE-2018-1002208 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
SharpZipLib before 1.0 RC1 is vulnerable to directory traversal, allowingattackers to write to arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in a Ziparchive entry that is mishandled during extraction. This vulnerability isalso known as 'Zip-Slip'.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1002208` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ca-certificates-mono - 6.8.0.105+dfsg-2
libmono-2.0-1 - 6.8.0.105+dfsg-2
libmono-accessibility4.0-cil - 6.8.0.105+dfsg-2
libmono-btls-interface4.0-cil - 6.8.0.105+dfsg-2
